decrementReferralCredits(address,uint256.details: Used to reduce credits when they are redeemed or if a referred transaction is reversed or invalidated.

params.artistCredits: Number of artist credits to decrement.
params.organizerCredits: Number of organizer credits to decrement.
params.referrer: Address of the referrer whose credits are to be reduced.
params.venueCredits: Number of venue credits to decrement.

getReferralCredits(address).details: Can be used to display credit balances or determine eligibility for benefits.

params.referrer: Address for which to retrieve referral credits.

returns._0: ReferralCredits Struct containing the counts of credits for each category.

incrementReferralCredits(address,uint256.details: Typically called when a referred transaction successfully completes.

params.artistCredits: Number of credits to add to the artist category.
params.organizerCredits: Number of credits to add to the organizer category.
params.referrer: Address of the referrer to receive more credits.
params.venueCredits: Number of credits to add to the venue category.

setCreditControlPermission(address,bool).details: Only callable by the contract owner or an authorized admin.

params.contractAddress: Address of the contract to update permissions for.

decrementReferralCredits(address,uint256.notice: Decrements the referral credits for a given referrer.

getReferralCredits(address).notice: Retrieves the current referral credits for a specified referrer.

incrementReferralCredits(address,uint256.notice: Increments the referral credits for a given referrer.

setCreditControlPermission(address,bool).notice: Grants or revokes permission for a contract to adjust referral credits.
